sounds: I CAN SENSE YOUR BODY ROTTING!
name: Plagirath
strategy:
Do not run to the center of its room to avoid luring too many [[Disgusting Ooze]]s. The blocker should try to trap it near a wall while the shooters stay distant to avoid the area damage. During the fight, it's recommended to avoid running around since the [[Disgusting Ooze]]s use a very strong paralyze spell and will constantly spawn around the room. All shooters should attack mainly with [[Great Fireball Rune]]s in order to kill the summons around the blocker. 

During the fight, Plagirath will sometimes transform its target into a [[Bog Raider]]. When this transformation runs out after about 10 seconds, the transformed player will "explode" receiving 1500 damage and that will also hit the players around him. Since running around the room is not recommended, shooters should stay distant from the blocker and when the transformation happens everyone should make sure they have enough mana and health to take the explosion. 

Note that once '''Plagirath''' dies, the [[Disgusting Ooze]]s will '''not''' disappear, so leaving the boss room must also be done carefully and in an organized manner. Killing the boss near the exit will make this last step safer.
